Header.title: Website and Mobile Apps Design & Development
Header.paragraph: We Provide IT solutions and business transforming digital solutions to our clients.

About.paragraph: Our expertise in technology understanding and software coding for web solution projects along with a team of techno savvy web experts, software professionals give a value added dimension to any project with their ‘think beyond’ work culture. We integrate every special element, experience and expertise to turn out every solution, a signature solution.
Why: We Help Solve Your Business Problems.
A Wide Spectrum Of Skills & Experience.
Why2: We Are FUN To Work With
Fast Response To Requests & Critical Response Time Guaranteed.

Services.name: Mobile App Development
Services.text: SoftGenerate  is a growing custom app development company. We develop mobile apps for Android, Iphone and hybrid platforms.

Services.name: Custom Web Development
Services.text: SoftGenerate is an eminent custom web development company which has a team of vivacious mix of competent, motivated & devoted developers.

Services.name: Web & Mobile Responsive Design (UI & UX)
Services.text: User interface is the first thing which attracts visitors & holds them. SoftGenerate is known for creative and professional web design services.

Services.name: Digital Marketing, Seo ,Email Marketing , Social Media Marketing
Services.text: Every large and small business requires digital marketing services. We include the whole range of digital marketing like SEO, PPC, Email Marketing, Social Media Marketing, and Local Business listing to increase business revenue.

Services.name: Dot Net
Services.text: SoftGenerate provides the excellent dot net (software & sites ) development services at reliable cost.

Services.name: CMS Development
Services.text: We provide best custom CMS development on all major content management systems that will help you to stand out from the competitive crowd.

Services.name: CRM Development
Services.text: SoftGenerate provides the excellent CRM (Customer Relationship Management) development services at reliable cost.

Services.name: Software support maintenance services cover:
Services.text: Corrective Maintenance(Bug Fixing, Text automation, Testing etc.)We provide 24 hours Customer support

Testimonials.text: When you step back and look at everything softgenerate provides, it has everything you’d want if you were building out your own personal safety monitoring app. Instead of it being one part of our stack we have to fight with and maintain, softgenerate  takes care of everything for us.
Testimonials.name: Dr. Ralph K.

Testimonials.text: I had a meeting with a number of developers, but when I met Deep, he asked heaps of critical questions and demonstrated an insightful understanding of my unique needs, which is new. He told me straight what needed to be done and what could be done in the given time and budget constraints. In fact, they have over-delivered, which is so unusual. I highly recommended softgenerate to industry colleagues, who have struggled to find a reliable tech partner.
Testimonials.name: _Fi H.

Testimonials.text: Working with your company was a very pleasant experience. He is a not only a highly skilled programmer but a brilliant communicator. There was no problem which he was not able to deal with, and no issue that he could not help me resolve; his experience really did shine throughThe project that he worked on for me was relatively complex, yet he was still able to produce the finished product to a very high standard. It is without question that I would use his services again in the future.Thank you!!
Testimonials.name: Alex

Testimonials.text: softgenerate have been very good to me since they took over the background work on my website. Initially they looked at my competition, my services and site and recommended new keywords for me.Those little keywords have enabled my to move way up the all important google lists and I am now consistently in the top 5.softgenerate are now working on getting the rest of my site and the background database up to date as it should be (not as I thought it should be).I have had no problems with softgenerate and their multisite operation enables them to work on my site all day and night!
Testimonials.name: Dan Bennett.

Testimonials.text: This would be my second project with softgenerate. These are wonderful bunch of professionals. Great to work with softgenerate.
Testimonials.name: Anura v.

Testimonials.text: Great people to work with. They are full of professional etiquette and true ethics. Such an amazing team with clear skills and quality techniques.
Testimonials.name: Gopal

Testimonials.text: I really enjoyed working with SoftGenerate. His communication was excellent, he met all deadlines, and his skills were strong. At one point I asked for an additional milestone and he was very forthcoming... I will work with him on additional jobs in the future.
Testimonials.name: Sue

Contact.address: Devi Nagar Rd, Pawan Vihar Colony, Devi Nagar, Sodala, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302019

Features.title: Service Pages
Features.text: It is important that prospective clients know what you can do for them. Have a page on your website that lists your top IT services, which can link to individual pages for sub-practice areas or further information. Consider linking to additional resources like specific case studies for that service, or testimonials to aid in the hiring process.
